1: יֹ֭שֵׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>He that dwelleth</n> בְּסֵ֣תֶר <sup>5643 </sup> <n>in the secret</n> עֶלְי֑וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>place of the most High</n> בְּצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>under the shadow</n> שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <sup>7706 </sup> <n>of the Almighty</n> יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>shall abide</n>
2: אֹמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>I will say</n> לַֽ֭יהוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מַחְסִ֣י <sup>4268 </sup> <n>[He is] my refuge</n> וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י <sup>4686 </sup> <n>and my fortress</n> אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> אֶבְטַח־ <sup>982 </sup> <n>in him will I trust</n> בּֽוֹ׃
3: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>Surely he shall deliver</n> מִפַּ֥ח <sup>6341 </sup> <n>thee from the snare</n> יָק֗וּשׁ <sup>3353 </sup> <n>of the fowler</n> מִדֶּ֥בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>pestilence</n> הַוּֽוֹת׃ <sup>1942 </sup> <n>[and] from the noisome</n>
4: בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ ׀ <sup>84 </sup> <n>thee with his feathers</n> יָ֣סֶךְ <sup>5526 </sup> <n>He shall cover</n> לָ֭ךְ וְתַֽחַת־ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and under</n> כְּנָפָ֣יו <sup>3671 </sup> <n>and under his wings</n> תֶּחְסֶ֑ה <sup>2620 </sup> <n>shalt thou trust</n> צִנָּ֖ה <sup>6793 </sup> <n>[shall be thy] shield</n> וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה <sup>5507 </sup> <n>and buckler</n> אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>571 </sup> <n>his truth</n>
5: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִ֭ירָא <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not be afraid</n> מִפַּ֣חַד <sup>6343 </sup> <n>for the terror</n> לָ֑יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>by night</n> מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>[nor] for the arrow</n> יָע֥וּף <sup>5774 </sup> <n>[that] flieth</n> יוֹמָֽם׃ <sup>3119 </sup> <n>by day</n>
6: מִ֭דֶּבֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>[Nor] for the pestilence</n> בָּאֹ֣פֶל <sup>652 </sup> <n>in darkness</n> יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>[that] walketh</n> מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב <sup>6986 </sup> <n>[nor] for the destruction</n> יָשׁ֥וּד <sup>7736 </sup> <n>[that] wasteth</n> צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <sup>6672 </sup> <n>at noonday</n>
7: יִפֹּ֤ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> מִצִּדְּךָ֨ ׀ <sup>6654 </sup> <n>at thy side</n> אֶ֗לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>A thousand</n> וּרְבָבָ֥ה <sup>7233 </sup> <n>and ten thousand</n> מִימִינֶ֑ךָ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>at thy right hand</n> אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִגָּֽשׁ׃ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>[but] it shall not come nigh</n>
8: רַ֭ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>with</n> בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>Only with thine eyes</n> תַבִּ֑יט <sup>5027 </sup> <n>shalt thou behold</n> וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת <sup>8011 </sup> <n>the reward</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and see</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מַחְסִ֑י <sup>4268 </sup> <n>[which is] my refuge</n> עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>[even] the most High</n> שַׂ֣מְתָּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>Because thou hast made</n> מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <sup>4583 </sup> <n>thy habitation</n>
10: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> תְאֻנֶּ֣ה <sup>579 </sup> <n>befall</n> אֵלֶ֣יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> רָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>There shall no evil</n> וְ֝נֶ֗גַע <sup>5061 </sup> <n>thee neither shall any plague</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִקְרַ֥ב <sup>7126 </sup> <n>come nigh</n> בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>thy dwelling</n>
11: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מַ֭לְאָכָיו <sup>4397 </sup> <n>For he shall give his angels</n> יְצַוֶּה־ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>charge</n> לָּ֑ךְ לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>over thee to keep</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>thee in all thy ways</n>
12: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> כַּפַּ֥יִם <sup>3709 </sup> <n>in [their] hands</n> יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>They shall bear thee up</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּגֹּ֖ף <sup>5062 </sup> <n>lest thou dash</n> בָּאֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>against a stone</n> רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>thy foot</n>
13: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> שַׁ֣חַל <sup>7826 </sup> <n>upon the lion</n> וָפֶ֣תֶן <sup>6620 </sup> <n>and adder</n> תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>Thou shalt tread</n> תִּרְמֹ֖ס <sup>7429 </sup> <n>shalt thou trample under feet</n> כְּפִ֣יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>the young lion</n> וְתַנִּֽין׃ <sup>8577 </sup> <n>and the dragon</n>
14: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> בִ֣י חָ֭שַׁק <sup>2836 </sup> <n>Because he hath set his love</n> וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <sup>6403 </sup> <n>upon me therefore will I deliver</n> אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ <sup>7682 </sup> <n>him I will set him on high</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> יָדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>because he hath known</n> שְׁמִֽי׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>my name</n>
15: יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי ׀ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>He shall call</n> וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>upon me and I will answer</n> עִמּֽוֹ־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>will be with</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>him</n> בְצָרָ֑ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>him I [will be] with him in trouble</n> אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ <sup>2502 </sup> <n>I will deliver</n> וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>him and honour</n>
16: אֹ֣רֶךְ <sup>753 </sup> <n>With long</n> יָ֭מִים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>life</n> אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>will I satisfy</n> וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>him and shew</n> בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>him my salvation</n>
